wiki.content:
The Message is the last song from Dr. Dre's album 2001, closing out the album. It is dedicated to his deceased brother, Tyree. The lyrics were ghostwritten by rapper Royce da 5'9". Controversy followed when this information came out, as the subject matter of the song is very personal and it wasn't even written by Dre.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: The Message is the last song from Dr. Dre's album 2001, closing out the album. It is dedicated to his deceased brother, Tyree. The lyrics were ghostwritten by rapper Royce da 5'9". Controversy followed when this information came out, as the subject matter of the song is very personal and it wasn't even written by Dre.
